Aeroseal’s technologies - HomeSeal Connect and AeroBarrier Connect - inject a fog of sealant particles into these pressurized spaces. These particles safely seal leaks as big as ½” and as small as a human hair. Software tracks the entire process, creating a certificate of completion showing before and after leakage.
Aeroseal is one of the fastest-growing clean technology companies in the U.S. and currently has a presence in 27 countries and all 50 states across the U.S. Our technology has sealed nearly 200,000 projects and saved nearly $2 billion in wasted energy.
